resources.string: Check this box to allow PGPClipper stay alive in background.\nNote that this application *will* access clipboard data.
OpenPGP API Library - Apache License 2.0\nGoldfinger - Apache License 2.0
Press result field for fast reply
To try again, Press result field.
Error, cannot continue. Send bug report to author.
Check this box to allow PGPClipper perform signature with NFC token.\nNote that this application *will* store your PGP password if you enable this function.
%1$s to authenticate\nPress result field for password/stored credential fallback

This Wizard will help you setup NFC token authentication.

Press next to continue.
Press close to close this wizard at anytime.
Generating salt value for encryption.\nPlease wait.
Now you will provide your default key\'s password.\nThis information will be encrypted.
Tap NFC token to your device.
Tap NFC token to your device again.
This NFC token cannot be used.

Generating hash and encryptingâ€¦
This might take a long time (few minutes)
depending on your device's power.

Screen will stay on.
%1$s to sign and encrypt message\nPress reply for password fallback
Check this box to allow PGPClipper perform signature with fingerprint.\nNote that this application *will* store your PGP password if you enable this function.

This Wizard will help you setup fingerprint authentication.

Press next to continue.
Press close to close this wizard at anytime.
Locate your device\'s fingerprint sensor, and scan.
Could not read fingerprint from sensor, try again.
Notifies user about possible PGP data block detection
From Android M, PGPClipper requires user to disable battery optimization in order to read clipboard data in the background. Please disable battery optimization.
